title: Hextech gunblade not good on LB.
body:
I tried to several times, and it's just not worth it unless you are really in late game. 

First, it is too expensive. It costs like 3200+ and you are better off getting rabaodn(35% extra AP) or even Lich bane(10% CDR, 8% MS, 80 AP). I mean, you have no reason to get any AD stat. 

Second, it doesn't really go with Leblanc's concept. Her job is to kill enemies and poof back to safety, but getting hextech gunblade means youa re oging to stay near the enemies for prolonged time...but unlike Akali or Kat, LB can't do that because hse doesn't have any skill cooldown reset mechanism.

replies.body:
I've got a few Korean pros and my own match history telling me that you're wrong, bud.

Also, Gunblade has a 2 second slow. Call me crazy but if you're playing LeBlanc it's almost as if you want to hold someone relatively close to you for about 2 seconds.

LeBlanc mains take hextech gunblade for the **active** and spellvamp

Her Q, E, and mimics are also single target and heal considerably when facing teams with other burst mages and their AD carries

It works on her because the Q is coded as single target damage, which heals you for a LOT. Its just a different playstyle. You poke hard, then heal up. Poke hard, heal up until the enemy just can't keep up with you. Plus the burst active obviously works well for it. That is why everyone, including the pros use it.

Im not really sure who said hextech gunblade was good on lb... first time hearing of it... What i would do is try protobelt instead there friend.

Edit: Sorry a bit of ignorance here, i didn't realize hextech lb was a thing. My bad.
